content: **knitted jacket in drops kid-silk and drops flora the piece is worked top down with stocking stitch raglan and ¾-length sleeves sizes s - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern fl-093 yarn group a + a or c ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **yarn** drops flora from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 200-200-200-250-250-250 g colour 16 pistachio and use drops kid-silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 100-100-100-125-125-125 g colour 18 apple green **needles** drops circular needle size 4 5 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm drops circular needle size 3 mm length 80 cm drops double pointed needles size 4 5 mm drops double pointed needles size 3 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need 80 cm circular needle in each size **buttons** drops buttons no 511 5-5-6-6-6-6 items **knitting gauge** 18 stitches in width and 24 row in height with stocking stitch and 1 strand of each quality on needle size 4 5 mm = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
